column8: text

Selangor Sultan concurs with MB; Pas's exco members to stayKUALA LUMPUR: Pas’s three executive councillors in the Selangor state government will retain their posts.In a statement today, Sultan of Selangor Sultan Sharafuddin Idris Shah said that he agrees with Menteri Besar Datuk Seri Azmin Ali that the state’s present exco line-up should be maintained.The Sultan said he was recently briefed by Azmin on the matter.Selangor Pas commissioner Sallehen Mukhyi also had an audience with the Sultan, accompanied by the three exco members – Iskandar Abdul Samad, Zaidy Abdul Talib and Ahmad Yunus Hairi.https://sg.news.yahoo.com/selangor-sultan-c...-013341515.htmlSudah cakap PAS jadi kingmaker tak mahu dengar, Keluar Pas terpekik terlolong now everybody abandon. Itulah bodo namanya
Revolt? Maybe just let them be. The cure could be worse than the disease.
